about_the_game:
FirefighterConnon is a linear short narrative visual novel inspired by the TV series "Weird City" (Ep1. "The One").
The story takes place in a modern world where humans and beast-people coexist. Players will take on the role of the human protagonist, Luo Geng, who has reached the legal marriageable age of 22. Unexpectedly, he forms a marital relationship with a beast-person firefighter named Connor.
The free demo version is now available on Steam, which includes two chapters of the game for free!

FirefighterConnor Discord Channel:

The full version contains ten chapters, including 22 CGs (with variations), 18 original music tracks, 114,000+ words of dialogue script, and 94 chibi-style character expressions (with variations). The estimated playtime is 2 hours.
Feel free to add the game to your wishlist to stay up-to-date with the latest developments!

short_description: Firefighter Connor is a linear narrative visual novel that tells a story in a modern world where humans and furries coexist. The player will play the role of Luo Geng, who is 22 year-old, eligible for marriage registration, and somehow ends up with a marriage with a furry firefighter named Connor.
